titleInfo.title: 'File 19/6 Tours. Tour of HBM's Minister and Legation Staff, Tehran'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically. There are notes at the end of the file, on folios 25-27. The notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file; they give brief description of the correspondence with a number in blue and red crayon, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 28; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 1-27; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains telegrams and correspondence regarding arrangements for official visits of the British Minister and the Legation Staff at Tehran to Bahrain and the Persian Gulf countries.The principal correspondents are: the Mesopotamia Persia Corporation Limited; the Ruler of Bahrain, Shaikh Ḥamad bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah; the British Minister at Tehran; the Residency Agent at Sharjah; the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf; and the Political Agent at Bahrain. The correspondence with the Ruler of Bahrain is in Arabic with English translation.
